abstract: Charles C Dorego, general council for Manhattan real estate development company Glenwood Management, signs non-prosecution agreement with FBI and becomes cooperating witness in federal criminal cases against former New York State Assembly Speaker Sheldon Silver and former State Senate Republican majority leader Dean G Skelos; Dorego is not charged with any wrongdoing.
lead_paragraph: Charles C. Dorego, general counsel for Glenwood Management, figures prominently in federal criminal complaints against Sheldon Silver and Dean G. Skelos that involve payoffs, graft, fraud and solicitation of bribes.

headline.main: New York Real Estate Executive With ‘Access to Politicians’ Is at Center of Scandals
headline.print_headline: Real Estate Executive With ‘Access to Politicians’ Is at Center of Scandals

snippet: Charles C. Dorego, general counsel for Glenwood Management, figures prominently in federal criminal complaints against Sheldon Silver and Dean G. Skelos that involve payoffs, graft, fraud and solicitation of bribes.
